official_title: To amend the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 1991 to increase the number of weeks of eligibility for emergency unemployment compensation.

summary.text: Amends the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 1991 (Public Law 102-164) to increase the number of weeks of eligibility for emergency unemployment compensation.
